Package com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.test.conformance

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Conformance
    Conformance is an application that runs a ConformanceTestSet and dumps results comparing the actual and expected results.
    ConformancePIPEngine
    ConformancePIPEngine implements the PIPFinder interface to find attributes loaded from a text file containing the following fields: category-id,attribute-id,datatype-id,issuer,value
    ConformanceRepository
    ConformanceRepository represents one or more policies for a single policy test, which will include one or more root policies, and zero or more referenced policies.
    ConformanceScopeResolver
    ConformanceScopeResolver implements com.att.research.xacml.pdp.ScopeResolver for the conformance tests using a fixed set of hierarchical resources defined in a map.
    ConformanceTest
    ConformanceTest represents a collection of XACML files with a root Policy document, optional referenced Policy documents, a Request, and a Response.
    ConformanceTestEngine
    ConformanceTestEngine handles the creation of the PDPEngine for a ConformanceTest instance.
    ConformanceTestResult
    ConformanceTestResult holds all of the objects for a single conformance test run.
    ConformanceTestSet
    ConformanceTestSet represents a collection of ConformanceTests ordered by the test name.
    ResponseMatchResult
    ResponseMatchResult provides information about how a Response object matches another Response object.
    ResultMatchResult
    ResultMatchResult provides information about how well a Result object matches another Result object.
